mapper.sql: id, org_id, name, number, province, area, city, latitude, longitude, address, link_man, mobile, phone, create_time, update_time, state, zip_code, province_id, city_id, area_id, syn_status, mdm_number, jde_address_code, jde_company_code, jde_number
mapper.insert:
select nextval('nros_store_id_seq')
insert into nros_store (id, org_id, name, number, province, area, city, latitude, longitude, address, link_man, mobile, phone, create_time, update_time, state, zip_code, province_id, city_id, area_id, syn_status, mdm_number, jde_address_code, jde_company_code, jde_number) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{state,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{synStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mdmNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jdeAddressCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{jdeCompanyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jdeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select
from nros_store ts where 1=1
and ts.name like concat('%',#{storeDO.name},'%')
and ts.state = #{storeDO.state}
mapper.update:
update nros_store
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
link_man = #{linkMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE},
state = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR},
zip_code = #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
syn_status = #{synStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
mdm_number = #{mdmNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jde_address_code = #{jdeAddressCode,jdbcType=BIGINT},
jde_company_code = #{jdeCompanyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jde_number = #{jdeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
